</body>***мяч.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяч</a> (4234)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%87amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/m%C4%99%C4%8D%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Slavic/męčь (page does not exist)">*męčь</a></i>, related to <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мягкий.html>мя́гкий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">mjáxkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. Cognate with <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Ukrainian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="uk">м'яч</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Uk-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mʺjač</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Belarusian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Belarusian language">Belarusian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="be"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяч</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Be-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mjač</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Czech_language" class="extiw" title="w:Czech language">Czech</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cs">míč</i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Slovene_language" class="extiw" title="w:Slovene language">Slovene</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="sl">mȇč</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%87amp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяч</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">mjač</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяча́</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мячи́</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяче́й</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>ball</li></ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:мячик.html>мя́чик</a> (13094)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяч</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mjač</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ик</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мячик.html>мя́чик</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">mjáčik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мячик.html>мя́чика</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мячик.html>мя́чики</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мячик.html>мя́чиков</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">Diminutive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мяч.html>мяч</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">mjač</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: (small) ball</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BC%D1%8F%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b>мя<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чик</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-мяч-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ик</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> (3)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=13" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*na</i>, from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro"><a href="/w/index.php?Title=Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h%E2%82%82neh%E2%82%83amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/h₂neh₃ (page does not exist)">*h₂neh₃</a></i>.
</p>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;">  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"></div><a href = vnd.unilang:собака.html>соба́ка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пень.html>пне́</a> (a dog on a stump)</div></div></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Preposition_4">Preposition</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=15" title="Edit section: Preposition">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">na</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> onto, on
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стол</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> stol</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b>onto</b> the table</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">Поставь/Положи <a href = vnd.unilang:тарелка.html>таре́лку</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>стол</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Postávʹ/Položí tarélku <b>na</b> stol.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Put the plate <b>onto</b> the table.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сесть.html>сел</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стул.html>стул</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja sel <b>na</b> stul.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I've sat <b>on</b> a chair.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наступить.html>наступи́л</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> что-то.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja nastupíl <b>na</b> što-to.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I stepped <b>on</b> something.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наступить.html>наступи́л</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:мина.html>мину</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja nastupíl <b>na</b> mínu.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I stepped <b>on</b> a land mine.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:случайно.html>случа́йно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наступить.html>наступи́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:извинить.html>извини́</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja <b>na</b> tebja slučájno nastupíl, izviní.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I stepped on you accidently, sorry.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наступить.html>наступи́л</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чку</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja nastupíl <b>na</b> žváčku.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I stepped <b>in</b> gum.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:твой.html>Твоё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пальто.html>пальто́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:висеть.html>виси́т</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:крючок.html>крючке́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стена.html>стене</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Tvojó palʹtó visít <b>na</b> krjučké <b>na</b> stené.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Your coat is hung <b>on</b> the hook <b>on</b> the wall.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>Не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хотеть.html>хочу́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чтобы.html>чтобы</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> меня <a href = vnd.unilang:повесить.html>пове́сили</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:убийство.html>уби́йство</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ne xočú, štóby <b>na</b> menjá povésili ubíjstvo.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I don't want the crime to be pinned <b>on</b> me.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">places, only certain nouns</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> nearby, by (in the sense of near). Interchangable with <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> (which requires genitive case).
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мы.html>Мы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>живём</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> море/реке/озере, <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> котором/которой/котором <a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>живёт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:много.html>мно́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рыба.html>рыб</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">My živjóm <b>na</b> móre/reké/ózere, v kotórom/kotóroj/kotórom živjót mnógo ryb.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">We live <b>by</b> a sea/river/lake in which many fish live.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to, toward
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:почта.html>почту</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> póčtu</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to the post office</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>Всё</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уходить.html>ухожу́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:работа.html>рабо́ту</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Vsjó, ja uxožu <b>na</b> rabotu.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">That's it, I'm going <b>to</b> work now.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двинуться.html>дви́нулся</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:север.html>север</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:затем.html>зате́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обратно.html>обра́тно</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On dvínulsja <b>na</b> séver, zatém obrátno.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He moved north then back.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:германия.html>Германия</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:двинуться.html>дви́нется</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мы.html>нас</a></b>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">A jésli Germánija dvínetsja <b>na nas</b>?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">What if Germany moves towards <b>us</b>?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>У</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>две́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:минута.html>мину́ты</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сбор.html>сбо́ры</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">U tebjá dve minúty <b>na</b> sbóry.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">You have two minutes <b>to</b> pack [your belongings].</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:наш.html>На́ша</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:благотворительный.html>благотвори́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:компания.html>компа́ния</a> направлена <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:улучшение.html>улучше́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мир.html>ми́ра</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Náša blagotvorítelʹnaja kompánija naprávlena <b>na</b> ulučšénije míra.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Our charitable organization is aimed <b>to</b> improve the world.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to set out for (in the sense "to start an activity with the intention of finishing it"), to go for
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>Не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:идти.html>иди́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́того</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дракон.html>драко́на</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:смочь.html>смо́жешь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:убить.html>уби́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пока.html>пока́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:надо.html>надо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сначала.html>снача́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тот</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BA%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="квест (page does not exist)">квест</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выполнить.html>вы́полнить</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ne idí <b>na</b> étovo drakóna, ty jevó ne smóžešʹ ubítʹ póka, tebé nádo snačála tot kvest výpolnitʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Don't go <b>for</b> that dragon, you can't kill it for now, you need to complete that other quest first.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ну.html>Ну</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ладно.html>ла́дно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="прокачаться (page does not exist)">прокачался</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:достаточно.html>доста́точно</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:пойти.html>пойду́</a>) <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:главный.html>гла́вного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:босс.html>бо́сса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сейчас.html>сейча́с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Nu ládno, ja prokačálsja dostátočno, tak što (pojdú) <b>na</b> glávnovo bóssa sejčás ja.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Okay, I've levelled up enough, and now I'm set out <b>for</b> the final boss.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:эй.html>Эй</a>! <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>Не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:надо.html>надо</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> меня! <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:твой.html>твой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:союзник.html>сою́зник</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ej! Ne nádo <b>na</b> menjá! Ja že tvoj sojúznik.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Hey, don't attack me (don't go <b>after</b> me)! I'm your teammate.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">duration, value, purpose</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> for
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> što?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">what for?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:удача.html>уда́чу</a>!</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Éto tebé <b>na</b> udáču!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I'm giving you this <b>for</b> good luck!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">А-а, дак <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:удача.html>уда́чу</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">A-a, dak éto tebé <b>na</b> udáču.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Oh, this is <b>for</b> your luck.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебя́</a> 500 <a href = vnd.unilang:рубль.html>рубле́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:поставить.html>поста́вил</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подвести.html>подведи́</a> меня.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja <b>na</b> tebjá 500 rubléj postávil, ne podvedí menjá.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I've bet 500 roubles <b>on</b> you, don't let me down.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">Подайте <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:пропитание.html>пропита́ние</a>!</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Podájte <b>na</b> propitánije!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Give us something (money, food, etc.) <b>to</b> eat!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:кто.html>кого́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:работать.html>рабо́таешь</a>? <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> Алексея?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Na</b> kovó rabótaješʹ? <b>Na</b> Alekséja?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Whom do you work <b>for</b>? For Alexey?</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> about, for
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:объявить.html>объяви́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:программа.html>програ́мму</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:следовать.html>сле́дующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:день.html>день</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On obʺjavíl prográmmu <b>na</b> slédujuščij denʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He announced a program <b>for</b> the next day.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">mathematics<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | +accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> over; by; divided by
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:шесть.html>Шесть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:делиться.html>де́лится</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Šestʹ délitsja <b>na</b> tri — eto dva.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Six divided <b>by</b> three is two.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пять.html>пять</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:два.html>два</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:делиться.html>де́лится</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">pjatʹ <b>na</b> dva ne délitsja</i> ― <span class="e-translation">five is not divisible <b>by</b> two</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">time</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> in, for
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сегодня.html>сего́дня</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a>!</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Na</b> sevódnja vsjó!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">That's all <b>for</b> today!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:завтра.html>за́втра</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́е</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:задание.html>зада́ние</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Na</b> závtra tebe takóje zadánije.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Here is a task that's ought to be completed by tomorrow.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:хотеть.html>Хо́чешь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остаться.html>оста́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>тут</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сегодня.html>сего́дня</a>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Xóčešʹ ostátʹsja tut <b>na</b> sevódnja?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Would you like to stay here <b>for the rest of</b> the day (i.e. <b>till</b> tomorrow)?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:прийти.html>Придёшь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:следующий.html>сле́дующую</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неделя.html>неде́лю</a>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Pridjóšʹ na slédujuščuju nedelju?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Will you come for (whole of) the next week?</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+accusative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">time</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> in, for
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:прийти.html>Придёшь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:следующий.html>сле́дующей</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неделя.html>неде́ле</a>?</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Pridjóšʹ na slédujuščej nedele?</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Will you come the next week?</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> on, upon
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стол.html>столе́</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> stolé</i> ― <span class="e-translation">on the table</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сидеть.html>Сижу́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:стул.html>сту́ле</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Sižú <b>na</b> stúle.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I sit <b>on</b> a chair.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:сидеть.html>сиди́т</a>) <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:героиня.html>герои́не</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On (sidít) <b>na</b> geroíne.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He is <b>on</b> heroin.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">only with certain nouns</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span> in, at
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:почта.html>по́чте</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> póčte</i> ― <span class="e-translation">at the post office</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:извинить.html>Извини́те</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сейчас.html>сейча́с</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:работа.html>рабо́те</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Izviníte, on sejčás <b>na</b> rabóte.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Sorry, he is at work.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:завод.html>заво́де</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> zavóde</i> ― <span class="e-translation">at the factory</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:балкон.html>балко́не</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>na</b> balkóne</i> ― <span class="e-translation">in the (inside) balcony (of a theater)</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:страна.html>Страна́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоит</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:край.html>кра́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бездна.html>бе́здны</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Strána stoít <b>na</b> krajú bézdny.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">The country is <b>at</b> the brink of an abbyss.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">'<i><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><b> <a href = vnd.unilang:украина.html>Укра́ине</a></b></i><b> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"></i></b><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">na<b> Ukraíne</b></i><b> ― <span class="e-translation"></span></b>in</i> Ukraine</div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> using a means of transport to get somewhere (while <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> is just 'to be in something')
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:мы.html>Мы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:автобус.html>авто́бусе</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вот.html>вот</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:теперь.html>тепе́рь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:опять.html>опя́ть</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:сидеть.html>сиди́м</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоим</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:иногда.html>иногда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прыгать.html>пры́гаем</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">My obýčno <b>na</b> avtóbuse, i vot tepérʹ opjátʹ <b>na</b> njóm; sidím v njóm, stoím, inogdá prýgajem.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">We usually go <b>by</b> bus, and now we've got <b>on</b> it again; here we're sitting, standing, and sometimes jumping.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> runs/operates only because of someone/something; works on, runs on
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>Да</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нём</a> полфирмы <a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоит</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>вся́</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B5_%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>да́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бог.html>бог</a> (page does not exist)"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>да́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бог.html>бог</a></a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ним</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:случиться.html>случи́тся</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Da <b>na</b> njóm polfírmy stoít, a to i vsja, ne daj bog s nim što slučítsja.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Half of the company or even the whole company <b>operates solely thanks to</b> the work he does, god forbid something bad happens to him.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>Их</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:компания.html>компа́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоит</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:строитель.html>строи́телях</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:они.html>они</a> — жадины — <a href = vnd.unilang:сидеть.html>сидя́т</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кресло.html>кре́слах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свои́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:получать.html>получа́ют</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:десять.html>де́сять</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раз.html>раз</a> больше, <a href = vnd.unilang:чем.html>чем</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8E%D0%B4%D1%8F%D0%B3%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="трюдяга (page does not exist)">трюдяги</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ix kompánija stoít <b>na</b> stroíteljax, a oní — žádiny — sidját na kréslax svoíx i pri étom polučájut v désjatʹ raz bólʹše, čem trjudjági.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Their company <b>lives only because they have </b> construction workers, nevertheless they—the greedy guys—just sit on their chair, and yet get ten times more money than the sloggers.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:дать.html>Да́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:компьютер.html>компью́тер</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:работать.html>рабо́тает</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:электричество.html>электри́честве</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> кока-коле.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Dánnyj kompʹjúter rabótajet ne na elektríčestve, a na kóka-kóle.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">This computer runs not <b>on</b> electricity, but <b>on</b> cola.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> is assigned to
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> мне (<a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоит</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:кухня.html>ку́хня</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:стоять.html>стоят</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:ребенок.html>де́ти</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:однако.html>одна́ко</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кухня.html>ку́хнею</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>она</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пора.html>поро́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:даже.html>да́же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:заниматься.html>занима́ется</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BEamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="заместо (page does not exist)">заместо</a> меня, <a href = vnd.unilang:хотеть.html>хотя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>того́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:просить.html>прошу́</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Na</b> mne (stoít) kúxnja, a <b>na</b> nej (stoját) déti, odnáko i kúxneju oná poróju dáže zanimájetsja zamésto menjá, xotjá jejó tovó i ne prošú.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I do the kitchen, while she raises children, yet sometimes she does my work without me asking her for.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дочь.html>дочь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мой.html>моя</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пока.html>пока́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вечер.html>ве́чером</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вернуться.html>верну́сь</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Na</b> tebé dočʹ mojá, poká ja véčerom ne vernúsʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">Look after my daughter until I come back in the evening.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">+prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> with, for</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">neologism<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | +prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> being dominated by a certain emotional state
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>вся́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:нерв.html>не́рвах</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рассказывать.html>расска́зывай</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ты.html>тебя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:там.html>там</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:случиться.html>случи́лось</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ja vsjá <b>na</b> nérvax, rasskázyvaj, štó u tebjá tam slučílosʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I'm so freaking <b>nervous</b>, tell me what happened to you.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:так.html>так</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:нерв.html>не́рвах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вчерашний.html>вчера́шнего</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:приставать.html>пристава́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>нему́</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On i tak <b>na</b> nérvax pósle včerášnevo, ne pristaváj k nemú.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">He is already <b>on edge</b> after what happened yesterday, don't bug him.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">neologism<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | +prepositional</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> accomplishing something while being dominated by a certain emotional state <b>and</b> primarily because of it
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:неожиданно.html>Неожи́данно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:проиграть.html>проигра́в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:три.html>три</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раз.html>ра́за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подряд.html>подря́д</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:охватить.html>охвати́ла</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%BC%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="дизмораль (page does not exist)">дизмораль</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:у.html>у</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:появиться.html>появи́лась</a> дизмораль), <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>ней</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:проиграть.html>проигра́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>все</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>други́е</a> 8 <a href = vnd.unilang:раз.html>раз</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Neožídanno proigráv tri ráza podrjád, jevo oxvatila dizmorálʹ (u nevó pojavílasʹ dizmorálʹ), i <b>na nej</b> proigrál i vse drugíje 8 raz.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">After he had suddenly lost 3 times in a row, he got <a href="/w/index.php?title=dismoralamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="dismoral (page does not exist)">dismoral</a>, and <b>while being affected by it</b> he lost all the remaining 8 times.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>После</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:долгий.html>до́лгой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:разлука.html>разлу́ки</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мы.html>мы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:удержаться.html>удержа́лись</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:радость.html>ра́достях</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:даже.html>да́же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:следовать.html>сле́дует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="приодеться (page does not exist)">приодевшись</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сразу.html>сра́зу</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пойти.html>пошли́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:загс.html>Загс</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жениться.html>жени́ться</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Pósle takój dólgoj razlúki, my ne uderžálisʹ, i <b>na rádostjax</b>, dáže kak slédujet ne priodévšisʹ, srázu že pošlí v ZAGS ženítʹsja.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">After such a long separation, <b>thanks to us being so happy</b> we couldn't hold it any longer and went straight to the marriage registrar's office in order to marry, without us even having dressed up appropriately.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>Понима́ете</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сын.html>сын</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мой.html>мой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ваш.html>ваш</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>но́вый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:телевизор.html>телеви́зор</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выкинуть.html>вы́кинул</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:окно.html>окно́</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:окно.html>окна</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:специальный.html>специально</a>… <a href = vnd.unilang:просто.html>про́сто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:эмоция.html>эмо́циях</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>после</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>того́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:застать.html>заста́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> телик — <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:просто.html>про́сто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:первый.html>пе́рвое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ему́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подвернуться.html>подверну́лось</a>.</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Ponimájete li, syn moj vaš nóvyj televízor výkinul v oknó (iz okná) ne speciálʹno… prósto on byl <b>na</b> emócijax pósle tovó, kak zastál jejó, a télik — on prósto pérvoje, što jemú podvernúlosʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation">You see, my son threw your new TV set out of the window unintentionally… it's just that he <b>had such an outburst of emotions</b> after having caught her, that he had <b>had to do something</b>, and the first thing that crossed his mind was your new TV set.</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=16" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">на-</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=17" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><span class="maintenance-line" style="color: 777777;">(This etymology is missing or incomplete. Please add to it, or discuss it at the Etymology scriptorium.)</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_3">Particle</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=19" title="Edit section: Particle">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">na</span>)
</p>
<ol><li>here! (said when giving someone something, i.e., "take it!")</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>Предло́г</a>; неизменяемое <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>сло́во</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>Как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:правило.html>пра́вило</a>, безударный. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ряд.html>ря́де</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочетание.html>сочета́ний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>ти́па</a> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зима.html>зи́му</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ночь.html>ночь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нога.html>ноги</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:ударение.html>ударе́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мочь.html>мо́жет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предлог.html>предло́г</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:следующий.html>сле́дующее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ним</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>существи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:превращаться.html>превраща́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> клитику. <a href = vnd.unilang:употребляться.html>Употребля́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> винительным, <a href = vnd.unilang:местный.html>ме́стным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> предложным <a href = vnd.unilang:падеж.html>падежо́м</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-на-</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:частица.html>Части́ца</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-на-</b>.
</p>

<ol><li> <a href = vnd.unilang:возглас.html>во́зглас</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:передача.html>переда́че</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:вручение.html>вруче́нии</a>, бросании чего-либо кому-либо, <a href = vnd.unilang:часто.html>ча́сто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сопровождаться.html>сопровожда́ющийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:определенный.html>определё́нным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жест.html>же́стом</a>; <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:набалдашник.html>набалда́шник</a> (26130)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">*набалдачник</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">*nabaldáčnik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">на-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">baldák</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">large glass, cone, annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nik</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, from <span class="etyl"><a <h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BAamp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набалдашник.html>набалда́шник</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nabaldášnik</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набалдашник.html>набалда́шника</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набалдашник.html>набалда́шники</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набалдашник.html>набалда́шников</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>knob <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">on the end of a cane or stick</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>

Луговская, «<a href = vnd.unilang:я.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:помнить.html>по́мню</a>», <span class="example-date">1970–1985 гг.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:<a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>ко́рпус</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:набат.html>наба́т</a> (24457)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/Arabic" class="extiw" title="w:Arabic">Arabic</a></span> <i class="Arab mention" lang="ar">نَوْبَة</i> |  <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ar-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nawba</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss">change of the guard</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набат.html>наба́т</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nabát</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набат.html>наба́та</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набат.html>наба́ты</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набат.html>наба́тов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>alarm, tocsin <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">also figuratively</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B0%D1%82amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:набег.html>набе́г</a> (15331)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Deverbal of <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">nabegátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набег.html>набе́г</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nabég</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набег.html>набе́га</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набежать.html>набеги</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набег.html>набе́гов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>incursion, raid, foray <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of barbarians, nomads, gangs, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>surge, rush, gust</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="набеговый (page does not exist)">набеговый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nabégovyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:бег.html>бег</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>на-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-бег-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:действие.html>де́йствие</a> | <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> гл. <a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li>набегание</li>
<li>частичн.: налёт, <a href = vnd.unilang:наскок.html>наско́к</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рейд.html>рейд</a></li>

</ol>
</body>***набегать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a> (11920)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1">Etymology 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology 1">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">на-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бегать.html>бегать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bégatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nabégatʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span>
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to cover a total <i>(distance)</i></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to run <i>(till one is)</i>, to run oneself <i>(to the point of)</i>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:себя.html>себе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:аппетит.html>аппети́т</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nabegatʹ</b> sebé appetít</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">to get a good appetite after much running</span></dd></dl></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:себя.html>себе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:одышка.html>оды́шку</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>nabegatʹ</b> sebé odýšku</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">to run till one is short of breath</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="набегаться (page does not exist)">набегаться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nabegatʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2">Etymology 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=8" title="Edit section: Etymology 2">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">на-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">na-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бегать.html>бегать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bégatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-átʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=11" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">nabegátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:набежать.html>набежа́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to run <i>(against)</i>, to dash</li>
<li><i>(waves)</i> to roll in, to <a href="/w/index.php?title=coast_inamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="coast in (page does not exist)">coast in</a></li>
<li>to run <i>(over)</i>, to cover
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:буква.html>бу́квы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гают</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одна́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>другу́ю</a></i><dl><dd><i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">búkvy nabegajut odná na drugúju</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">letters are running over</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to come running <i>(together)</i></li>
<li><i>(liquid)</i> to accumulate <i>(quickly)</i></li>
<li><i>(cloth)</i> to <a href="/w/index.php?title=ruck_upamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ruck up (page does not exist)">ruck up</a></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_2">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=13" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=3" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>на-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-бег-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li> <a href = vnd.unilang:бегать.html>бе́гая</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:довести.html>довести́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:себя.html>себя́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> какого-либо (<a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неблагоприятный.html>неблагоприя́тного</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:состояние.html>состоя́ния</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li> выдрессировать <a href = vnd.unilang:лошадь.html>ло́шадь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:приучить.html>приучи́в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хороший.html>хоро́шему</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бежать.html>бегу</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:набегать.html>набе́гать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.
